remarks:
Closure law for multiplication in the real subfield of complex numbers. Axiom 7 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly, nor should the proven axiom ~ ax-mulrcl be used later.  Instead, in most cases use ~ remulcl .  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1996.) 

---

 Closure law for multiplication in the real subfield of complex numbers. Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly, nor should the proven axiom ~ ax-mulrcl be used later.  Instead, in most cases use ~ remulcl .  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1996.)
statement: axmulrcl $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A x. B ) e. RR ) $.
